snippet.title: NWSL week 2 preview: How’s it going to be when Seattle’s not around?
snippet.description:
NWSL week 2 preview: How’s it going to be when Seattle’s not around? by Lauren Barker on Apr 19 2014, 11:47a
Seattle impressed everyone in week 1, landing at the top of the table for the first time ever. But thanks to the cruelty of the scheduling gods, the Reign have off until Wednesday. This week,...

snippet.title: Taking apart the University of Texas AD's 'facts' about athlete unions
snippet.description:
Taking apart the University of Texas AD's 'facts' about athlete unions by Kevin Trahan on Apr 18 2014, 10:42a
We run through all the factual inaccuracies the country's most powerful athletic director presents in his case against NCAA reform.

snippet.title: The Knicks' signing of Lamar Odom is more than meets the eye
snippet.description:
The Knicks' signing of Lamar Odom is more than meets the eye by Mark Deeks on Apr 18 2014, 1:49p
Why did the New York Knicks sign Lamar Odom with one day left in the season? It's all about the value his contract represents in the trade market.

snippet.title: Tiger Woods never stood a chance, 'streaking' at Augusta and other things we learned at the Masters
snippet.description:
Tiger Woods never stood a chance, 'streaking' at Augusta and other things we learned at the Masters by Brendan Porath on Apr 15 2014, 11:12a
It was another long week at Augusta. Here are some of the things we took away from the 2014 Masters.

snippet.title: Lowered expectations? Reassessing the historic Warriors 2013-14 season
snippet.description:
Lowered expectations? Reassessing the historic Warriors 2013-14 season by Eddie Maisonet on Apr 19 2014, 11:06a
The Golden State Warriors won 51 games this season, good for fourth-best in the franchise's 68-year history. For many fans, this isn't good enough. Fair or unfair?

snippet.title: WWE Superstars answer the important questions
snippet.description:
WWE Superstars answer the important questions by Bill Hanstock on Apr 16 2014, 12:08p
Come to see which of your favorite wrestlers always reclines their seat in an airplane. Stay for Road Dogg talking about Brigham Young.

snippet.title: 2014-15 college basketball top 25: An extremely early look at next season's top teams
snippet.description:
2014-15 college basketball top 25: An extremely early look at next season's top teams by Mike Rutherford on Apr 9 2014, 10:33a
There are a ridiculous amount of things that need to happen before we can realistically start looking at the 2014-15 season, but let's not let that fact be the thing that stands in our way.

snippet.title: Meet the Bag Man: How to buy college football players, in the words of a man who delivers the money
snippet.description:

The Bag Man excuses himself to make a call outside, on his "other phone," to arrange delivery of $500 in cash to a visiting recruit. The player is rated No. 1 at his position nationally and on...

snippet.title: The U.S. through presidential first pitches
snippet.description:
The U.S. through presidential first pitches by Steven Goldman on Apr 7 2014, 11:13a
Presidential first pitches reveal personality of the chief executive and the problems the nation was facing at the given moment. In this installment: 1910-1945.

snippet.title: 2014 NFL mock draft: The cost and risk of trading the No. 1 pick
snippet.description:
2014 NFL mock draft: The cost and risk of trading the No. 1 pick by Dan Kadar on Apr 7 2014, 8:00a
If the Atlanta Falcons want South Carolina defensive end Jadeveon Clowney, general manager Thomas Dimitroff may have to trade with the Houston Texans for the top choice.
